content.raw:
What happens here if the project is missing a `tutorials` directory? Will `s3cmd` ignore it, or will we get an error?

If it would cause an error, I can think of two ways to make this work:

1. Require all ignition projects to provide at least a skeleton tutorials directory (some are still missing this, like `ign-common`)

2. Use cmake to check whether the current project has the necessary `tutorials` directory, and use the configuration step to either put this line or keep this line out depending on whether cmake found the `tutorials` directory.

The second option would help make this PR compatible with projects that currently use `ign-cmake`. If that sounds like a good option, I'd be happy to quickly whip up that change.
